title: Hands-on: GeForce NOW M1 optimization update [Video]
content:
GeForce NOW is the go-to source for high quality game streaming across Apple devices, Android and PC. And NVIDIA’s released a substantial update to GeForce NOW that includes new features that M1 Mac users in particular will benefit from.

more…

The post Hands-on: GeForce NOW M1 optimization update [Video] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Now is the go-to source for high quality game streaming across Apple devices, Android and PC. And NVIDIA's released a substantial update to GeForce Now that includes new features that M1 Mac users in particular will benefit from.
